item.title: Making Dragon Claws hit X4. Method included plox
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

public void DClawSpec() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(600);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(600);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(600);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}

Now, Can somebody tell me what I need to make it hit X4, I have it hitting X2.

Read full topic
